# Results
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

# 1. Read the CSV cleanly
sector <- readr::read_csv("sector_etfs_clean.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  mutate(Date = as.Date(Date))   # make sure Date is a Date

# 2. Rebase prices (start = 100 for each sector)
sector_norm <- sector |>
  group_by(Sector) |>
  arrange(Date, .by_group = TRUE) |>
  mutate(
    base_price = first(`Adj Close`),
    rebased = `Adj Close` / base_price * 100
  ) |>
  ungroup()

# 3. Plot
ggplot(sector_norm, aes(x = Date, y = rebased, color = Sector)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(
    title = "Rebased Price Index (Start = 100)",
    y = "Index Level",
    x = "Date"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

```
